== Overview==
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Sign language is used all over the world by the hearing-impaired to communicate with each other and with those that hear. Sign Language Reader is a project that can translate sign language, from a video or web camera, into text or speech and other actions in real-time.

== Usability ==
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  * Visually Impaired can use sign language to operate their machines using sign based commands for keyboard replacement.
  * Dumb people can use to communicate by adding a Text to Speech Feature to communicate     over VOIP.
  * Elderly people for convenience.

== Features ==
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  * Maintaining database of features ( synching features).
  * Training / Incremental.
  * Adding Multiple Techniques / Voting / Support.
  * Text to speech / Integration with GUI.
  * Mobile Interface.


== Future Work == 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  * All type of Expressions.
  * Scale Invariant/ Rotation Invariant.
  * Sequence Identification in a Finite Automata.
  * Combinations of facial & hold expressions.
